name: Neon Express (chickenWing2)
description:
Neon Express is a puzzle-platformer-like game where the player controls 2 characters. However it is only possible for the player to get one character across to the other side, so they must 'pick a side'.

Avoid purple spikes, climb green platforms and get to the green diamond to go to the next level. 

This was a game made for a game jam called 'GeoJam 2022' held by Icoso! I only had around 2 days actually to participate in the jam so I tried to make the most of it. I learnt a lot of new things here; post processing, input managers etc. 

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Blue Player / Player 1

WASD Keys - Pink Player / Player 2
